## IGraphNode.getOutputType() method

Gets the output type for a specific output slot

**Signature:**

```typescript
getOutputType(id: number): string;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

id


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

The output slot ID


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

string

The type name of the output (e.g., 'float', 'vec3', 'mat4')

## Example


```typescript
const outputType = node.getOutputType(0);  // 'vec3'
```
